name: 0.5HP Self Priming Motor
description: A compact 0.5HP self-priming centrifugal pump with copper winding, delivering up to 30 meters head and 60 LPM flow for household and light irrigation tasks.

details.overview: Built with a robust cast-iron body and thermal overload protection, this motor efficiently transfers water from wells or sumps to overhead tanks, supports garden watering, and operates quietly with minimal maintenance.
applications: Transferring water from sumps or wells

name: 0.5HP Self Priming MonoBlock Motor
description: Lightweight 0.5HP monoblock pump with up to 18 meters head and 25 LPM discharge, ideal for domestic water transfer and small-scale gardening.

details.overview: Featuring self-priming design, thermal overload protection, and a compact aluminum/cast iron build, this motor offers reliable performance for homes, bungalows, and small irrigation setups.
applications: Water transfer from ground level to overhead tanks

name: 1HP Self Priming MonoBlock Motor
description: High-performance 1HP monoblock pump delivering up to 60 LPM at 9 meters head, perfect for domestic, agricultural, and light industrial applications.

details.overview: With pure copper winding, heavy-duty brass impeller, and corrosion-resistant body, this pump ensures efficient water supply, garden irrigation, and construction site usage under continuous operation.
applications: Domestic water supply to overhead tanks

name: 0.5HP Openwell Submersible Motor
description: Efficient 0.5HP openwell submersible pump with 42 meters head and up to 30 LPM discharge, designed for open well water lifting.

details.overview: Made from stainless steel/mild steel with in-built thermal overload protection, it delivers consistent performance for homes, farms, and small businesses, and comes ready with starter and cable.
features: Efficient water lifting from underground sources
Silent Operation with low power consumption
Starter & cable included for plug-and-play setup
applications: Homes, farms and small commercial establishments
Water transfer from open wells to overhead tanks

name: 1HP Openwell Submersible Motor
description: Powerful 1HP openwell submersible pump with 185 LPM flow and 30 meters head, ideal for large-scale domestic and agricultural supply.

details.overview: Featuring copper winding, water-cooled motor, and robust stainless steel/cast iron body, it operates quietly while delivering reliable water for irrigation, industrial use, and decorative fountains.
features: High lifting capacity for deep wells
Copper winding motor for durability and efficiency
Low Noise Operation with water cooling
Robust build with cast iron and stainless steel body

name: 1HP Openwell Submersible Pump(V type)
description: V-type 1HP openwell submersible pump with up to 165 LPM discharge and 42 meters head for efficient water lifting in varied applications.

details.overview: Built with copper winding, rust-resistant body, and water-lubricated bearings, this energy-efficient pump handles domestic supply, farm irrigation, and industrial needs with maintenance-free operation.

specs.label: Body Material
specs.value: Rust-resistant stainless steel or cast iron

features: Energy efficient design for lower operating costs
